placeholders.name: customer-id
placeholders.title: Customer ID
placeholders.description: Identifier of the user being called

placeholders.name: conversation-id
placeholders.title: Conversation ID
placeholders.description: Identifier of the RTC conversation where a call has been initiated

placeholders.name: csr-name
placeholders.title: Customer Service Representative Name
placeholders.description: Name of the customer service representative that has initiated the call

placeholders.name: call-type
placeholders.title: Call Type
placeholders.description: Indicates whether the call is voice (VOICE_CALL_INITIATED) or video (VIDEO_CALL_INITIATED)
